mapper.select: select c.certification_id as certification_id, c.phone_number as phone_number, c.id_number as id_number, c.real_name as real_name, c.school as school, c.major as major, c.student_card_photo_src as student_card_photo_src, c.state as state from certification as c left join user as u on c.certification_id = u.certification_id where u.uid = #{uid}
select * from certification where state = 2 limit 1
mapper.update: update certification as c left join user as u on c.certification_id = u.certification_id set c.id_number = #{id_number}, c.real_name = #{real_name}, c.school = #{school}, c.major = #{major}, c.student_card_photo_src = #{student_card_photo_src} where u.uid = #{uid}
